my-portfolio.name: details
my-portfolio.label: details
my-portfolio.value:
I am a digital designer and part time developer. I studied at the Global School of Design in London and have traveled the world working at many interesting companies. My passion for design has allowed me to work on some pretty awesome projects. Please take a look at the projects below and feel free to email me at jane.doe@anon.com.

I am currently available for jobs.
